content.question: Mesa Verde cliff dwellings were located on a sheltered ledge elevated above the valley floor for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: The exposure to the sun’s heat in winter and the assurance of shade in summer
The improved water drainage and the symbolic proximity to the heavens
The good air circulation and the location near important sacred sites
The access to highland plants and the astrological alignment of the site

content.answer: The exposure to the sun’s heat in winter and the assurance of shade in summer
